Class RunQueryWithoutSrcSel

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jena.cmd.CommandLineBase
org.apache.jena.cmd.CmdLineArgs
org.apache.jena.cmd.CmdMain
org.apache.jena.cmd.CmdArgModule
org.apache.jena.cmd.CmdGeneral
arq.cmdline.CmdARQ
se.liu.ida.hefquin.cli.RunQueryWithoutSrcSel
public class RunQueryWithoutSrcSel extends arq.cmdline.CmdARQ
A command-line tool that executes SPARQL queries using the HeFQUIN federation engine without source selection. This class extends CmdARQ for query processing, execution, and result handling within the HeFQUIN system. It also supports printing various statistics about query execution and federation access.
